parameters: empty home
Message from UNCLE
Message from UNCLE
Hey comrade!
I'm not sure if you've heard about these yet, but I've
sent you the excecutable to boot a METApet.
When it boots, a soft AI creature is booted. It will
follow you around your METAhome and whatever
metaservers you visit.
They aren't true AI, so they don't have instantaneous
information access, but they still have feelings and
a personality.
At the end of your care period with them, which is five
weeks, they will be converted into METAenergy relative
to the kind of care you provide.
The METAenergy can go towards generating real crops,
housing, or recycling plants.
You'll get a prompt to initialize your pet when you
close this message.
Have fun!
Initialize METAPet
Initialize METAPet

base basketball
You spend the week playing basketball with your
METApet.
You're surprised at their interest in playing,

day, you play a game against each other.
They put up more of a challenge than you expected, but
ultimately they couldn't really put up a fight.
